GE07mbh_03_u:1015: 03,018.003a vikṣipan nādayaṃś cāpi dhanuḥśreṣṭhaṃ mahābalaḥ 03,018.003c tūṇakhaḍgadharaḥ śūro baddhagodhāṅgulitravān
GE07mbh_03_u:1016: 03,018.004a sa vidyuccalitaṃ cāpaṃ viharan vai talāt talam
GE07mbh_03_u:1017: 03,018.004c mohayām āsa daiteyān sarvān saubhanivāsinaḥ 03,018.005a nāsya vikṣipataś cāpaṃ saṃdadhānasya cāsakṛt 03,018.005c antaraṃ dadṛśe kaś cin nighnataḥ śātravān raṇe
GE07mbh_03_u:1018: 03,018.006a mukhasya varṇo na vikalpate 'sya; celuś ca gātrāṇi na cāpi tasya
GE07mbh_03_u:1021: 03,018.007a jalecaraḥ kāñcanayaṣṭisaṃstho; vyāttānanaḥ sarvatimipramāthī 03,018.007c vitrāsayan rājati vāhamukhye; śālvasya senāpramukhe dhvajāgryaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:1022: 03,018.008a tataḥ sa tūrṇaṃ niṣpatya pradyumnaḥ śatrukarśanaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:1023: 03,018.008c śālvam evābhidudrāva vidhāsyan kalahaṃ nṛpa 03,018.009a abhiyānaṃ tu vīreṇa pradyumnena mahāhave 03,018.009c nāmarṣayata saṃkruddhaḥ śālvaḥ kurukulodvaha
GE07mbh_03_u:1024: 03,018.010a sa roṣamadamatto vai kāmagād avaruhya ca
GE07mbh_03_u:1025: 03,018.010c pradyumnaṃ yodhayām āsa śālvaḥ parapuraṃjayaḥ 03,018.011a tayoḥ sutumulaṃ yuddhaṃ
GE07mbh_03_u:1026: 03,018.011c sametā dadṛśur lokā balivāsavayor iva 03,018.012a tasya māyāmayo vīra ratho hemapariṣkṛtaḥ 03,018.012c sadhvajaḥ sapatākaś ca sānukarṣaḥ satūṇavān 03,018.013a sa taṃ rathavaraṃ śrīmān samāruhya kila prabho
GE07mbh_03_u:1027: 03,018.013c mumoca bāṇān kauravya pradyumnāya mahābalaḥ 03,018.014a tato bāṇamayaṃ varṣaṃ vyasṛjat tarasā raṇe
GE07mbh_03_u:1028: 03,018.014c pradyumno bhujavegena śālvaṃ saṃmohayann iva 03,018.015a sa tair abhihataḥ saṃkhye nāmarṣayata saubharāṭ
GE07mbh_03_u:1029: 03,018.015c śarān dīptāgnisaṃkāśān mumoca tanaye mama 03,018.015d*0079_01 tān āpatata (sic!) bāṇaughān sa ciccheda mahābalaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:1030: 03,018.015d*0079_02 tataś cānyāñ śarān dīptān pracikṣepa sute mama
GE07mbh_03_u:1031: 03,018.016a sa śālvabāṇai rājendra viddho rukmiṇinandanaḥ 03,018.016c mumoca bāṇaṃ tvarito marmabhedinam āhave 03,018.017a tasya varma vibhidyāśu sa bāṇo matsuteritaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:1032: 03,018.017c bibheda hṛdayaṃ patrī sa papāta mumoha ca
GE07mbh_03_u:1033: 03,018.018a tasmin nipatite vīre śālvarāje vicetasi 03,018.018c saṃprādravan dānavendrā dārayanto vasuṃdharām
GE07mbh_03_u:1034: 03,018.019a hāhākṛtam abhūt sainyaṃ śālvasya pṛthivīpate 03,018.019c naṣṭasaṃjñe nipatite tadā saubhapatau nṛpa 03,018.020a tata utthāya kauravya pratilabhya ca cetanām
GE07mbh_03_u:1035: 03,018.020c mumoca bāṇaṃ tarasā pradyumnāya mahābalaḥ 03,018.021a tena viddho mahābāhuḥ pradyumnaḥ samare sthitaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:1036: 03,018.021c jatrudeśe bhṛśaṃ vīro vyavāsīdad rathe tadā
GE07mbh_03_u:1037: 03,018.022a taṃ sa viddhvā mahārāja śālvo rukmiṇinandanam
GE07mbh_03_u:1038: 03,018.022c nanāda siṃhanādaṃ vai nādenāpūrayan mahīm 03,018.023a tato mohaṃ samāpanne tanaye mama bhārata
GE07mbh_03_u:1039: 03,018.023c mumoca bāṇāṃs tvaritaḥ punar anyān durāsadān
GE07mbh_03_u:1040: 03,018.024a sa tair abhihato bāṇair bahubhis tena mohitaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:1042: 03,019.001 vāsudeva uvāca 03,019.001a śālvabāṇārdite tasmin pradyumne balināṃ vare 03,019.001c vṛṣṇayo bhagnasaṃkalpā vivyathuḥ pṛtanāgatāḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:1043: 03,019.002a hāhākṛtam abhūt sārvaṃ vṛṣṇyandhakabalaṃ tadā 03,019.002c pradyumne patite rājan pare ca muditābhavan
GE07mbh_03_u:1044: 03,019.003a taṃ tathā mohitaṃ dṛṣṭvā sārathir javanair hayaiḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:1045: 03,019.003c raṇād apāharat tūrṇaṃ śikṣito dārukis tataḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:1048: 03,019.005a saute kiṃ te vyavasitaṃ kasmād yāsi parāṅmukhaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:1049: 03,019.005c naiṣa vṛṣṇipravīrāṇām āhave dharma ucyate 03,019.006a kaccit saute na te mohaḥ śālvaṃ dṛṣṭvā mahāhave 03,019.006c viṣādo vā raṇaṃ dṛṣṭvā brūhi me tvaṃ yathātatham 03,019.007 sūta uvāca 03,019.007a jānārdane na me moho nāpi me bhayam āviśat 03,019.007c atibhāraṃ tu te manye śālvaṃ keśavanandana
GE07mbh_03_u:1050: 03,019.008a so 'payāmi śanair vīra balavān eṣa pāpakṛt 03,019.008c mohitaś ca raṇe śūro rakṣyaḥ sārathinā rathī
GE07mbh_03_u:1051: 03,019.009a āyuṣmaṃs tvaṃ mayā nityaṃ rakṣitavyas tvayāpy aham
GE07mbh_03_u:1052: 03,019.009c rakṣitavyo rathī nityam iti kṛtvāpayāmy aham
GE07mbh_03_u:1053: 03,019.010a ekaś cāsi mahābāho bahavaś cāpi dānavāḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:1054: 03,019.010c nasamaṃ raukmiṇeyāhaṃ raṇaṃ matvāpayāmy aham 03,019.011 vāsudeva uvāca 03,019.011a evaṃ bruvati sūte tu tadā makaraketumān
GE07mbh_03_u:1055: 03,019.011c uvāca sūtaṃ kauravya nivartaya rathaṃ punaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:1056: 03,019.012a dārukātmaja maivaṃ tvaṃ punaḥ kārṣīḥ kathaṃ cana
GE07mbh_03_u:1057: 03,019.012c vyapayānaṃ raṇāt saute jīvato mama karhi cit
GE07mbh_03_u:1058: 03,019.013a na sa vṛṣṇikule jāto yo vai tyajati saṃgaram 03,019.013c yo vā nipatitaṃ hanti tavāsmīti ca vādinam
GE07mbh_03_u:1059: 03,019.014a tathā striyaṃ vai yo hanti vṛddhaṃ bālaṃ tathaiva ca
GE07mbh_03_u:1060: 03,019.014c virathaṃ viprakīrṇaṃ ca bhagnaśastrāyudhaṃ tathā 03,019.015a tvaṃ ca sūtakule jāto vinītaḥ sūtakarmaṇi
GE07mbh_03_u:1061: 03,019.015c dharmajñaś cāsi vṛṣṇīnām āhaveṣv api dāruke
GE07mbh_03_u:1062: 03,019.016a sa jānaṃś caritaṃ kṛtsnaṃ vṛṣṇīnāṃ pṛtanāmukhe
GE07mbh_03_u:1063: 03,019.016c apayānaṃ punaḥ saute maivaṃ kārṣīḥ kathaṃ cana
GE07mbh_03_u:1064: 03,019.017a apayātaṃ hataṃ pṛṣṭhe bhītaṃ raṇapalāyinam 03,019.017c gadāgrajo durādharṣaḥ kiṃ māṃ vakṣyati mādhavaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:1066: 03,019.018c kiṃ vakṣyati mahābāhur baladevaḥ samāgataḥ 03,019.019a kiṃ vakṣyati śiner naptā narasiṃho mahādhanuḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:1067: 03,019.019c apayātaṃ raṇāt saute sāmbaś ca samitiṃjayaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:1068: 03,019.020a cārudeṣṇaś ca durdharṣas tathaiva gadasāraṇau 03,019.020c akrūraś ca mahābāhuḥ kiṃ māṃ vakṣyati sārathe
GE07mbh_03_u:1069: 03,019.021a śūraṃ saṃbhāvitaṃ santaṃ nityaṃ puruṣamāninam 03,019.021c striyaś ca vṛṣṇīvīrāṇāṃ kiṃ māṃ vakṣyanti saṃgatāḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:1071: 03,019.022c dhig enam iti vakṣyanti na tu vakṣyanti sādhv iti
GE07mbh_03_u:1072: 03,019.023a dhig vācā parihāso 'pi mama vā madvidhasya vā
GE07mbh_03_u:1073: 03,019.023c mṛtyunābhyadhikaḥ saute sa tvaṃ mā vyapayāḥ punaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:1074: 03,019.024a bhāraṃ hi mayi saṃnyasya yāto madhunihā hariḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:1076: 03,019.025a kṛtavarmā mayā vīro niryāsyann eva vāritaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:1077: 03,019.025c śālvaṃ nivārayiṣye 'haṃ tiṣṭha tvam iti sūtaja
GE07mbh_03_u:1078: 03,019.026a sa ca saṃbhāvayan māṃ vai nivṛtto hṛdikātmajaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:1079: 03,019.026c taṃ sametya raṇaṃ tyaktvā kiṃ vakṣyāmi mahāratham
GE07mbh_03_u:1081: 03,019.027c puruṣaṃ puṇḍarīkākṣaṃ kiṃ vakṣyāmi mahābhujam 03,019.028a sātyakiṃ baladevaṃ ca ye cānye 'ndhakavṛṣṇayaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:1082: 03,019.028c mayā spardhanti satataṃ kiṃ nu vakṣyāmi tān aham 03,019.029a tyaktvā raṇam imaṃ saute pṛṣṭhato 'bhyāhataḥ śaraiḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:1083: 03,019.029c tvayāpanīto vivaśo na jīveyaṃ kathaṃ cana
GE07mbh_03_u:1084: 03,019.030a sa nivarta rathenāśu punar dārukanandana 03,019.030c na caitad evaṃ kartavyam athāpatsu kathaṃ cana
GE07mbh_03_u:1085: 03,019.031a na jīvitam ahaṃ saute bahu manye kadā cana 03,019.031c apayāto raṇād bhītaḥ pṛṣṭhato 'bhyāhataḥ śaraiḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:1086: 03,019.032a kadā vā sūtaputra tvaṃ jānīṣe māṃ bhayārditam
GE07mbh_03_u:1087: 03,019.032c apayātaṃ raṇaṃ hitvā yathā kāpuruṣaṃ tathā
GE07mbh_03_u:1088: 03,019.033a na yuktaṃ bhavatā tyaktuṃ saṃgrāmaṃ dārukātmaja
GE07mbh_03_u:1089: 03,019.033c mayi yuddhārthini bhṛśaṃ sa tvaṃ yāhi yato raṇam 03,020.001 vāsudeva uvāca 03,020.001a evam uktas tu kaunteya sūtaputras tadā mṛdhe
GE07mbh_03_u:1090: 03,020.001c pradyumnam abravīc chlakṣṇaṃ madhuraṃ vākyam añjasā
GE07mbh_03_u:1091: 03,020.002a na me bhayaṃ raukmiṇeya saṃgrāme yacchato hayān
GE07mbh_03_u:1092: 03,020.002c yuddhajñaś cāsmi vṛṣṇīnāṃ nātra kiṃ cid ato 'nyathā
GE07mbh_03_u:1093: 03,020.003a āyuṣmann upadeśas tu sārathye vartatāṃ smṛtaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:1094: 03,020.003c sarvārtheṣu rathī rakṣyas tvaṃ cāpi bhṛśapīḍitaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:1095: 03,020.004a tvaṃ hi śālvaprayuktena patriṇābhihato bhṛśam 03,020.004c kaśmalābhihato vīra tato 'ham apayātavān
GE07mbh_03_u:1096: 03,020.005a sa tvaṃ sātvatamukhyādya labdhasaṃjño yadṛcchayā 03,020.005c paśya me hayasaṃyāne śikṣāṃ keśavanandana 03,020.006a dārukeṇāham utpanno yathāvac caiva śikṣitaḥ 03,020.006c vītabhīḥ praviśāmy etāṃ śālvasya mahatīṃ camūm
GE07mbh_03_u:1097: 03,020.007a evam uktvā tato vīra hayān saṃcodya saṃgare
GE07mbh_03_u:1098: 03,020.007c raśmibhiś ca samudyamya javenābhyapatat tadā 03,020.008a maṇḍalāni vicitrāṇi yamakānītarāṇi ca
GE07mbh_03_u:1099: 03,020.008c savyāni ca vicitrāṇi dakṣiṇāni ca sarvaśaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:1100: 03,020.009a pratodenāhatā rājan raśmibhiś ca samudyatāḥ 03,020.009c utpatanta ivākāśaṃ vibabhus te hayottamāḥ 03,020.010a te hastalāghavopetaṃ vijñāya nṛpa dārukim 03,020.010c dahyamānā iva tadā paspṛśuś caraṇair mahīm
GE07mbh_03_u:1102: 03,020.011c cakāra nātiyatnena tad adbhutam ivābhavat 03,020.012a amṛṣyamāṇo 'pasavyaṃ pradyumnena sa saubharāṭ
GE07mbh_03_u:1103: 03,020.012c yantāram asya sahasā tribhir bāṇaiḥ samarpayat
GE07mbh_03_u:1104: 03,020.013a dārukasya sutas taṃ tu bāṇavegam acintayan
GE07mbh_03_u:1105: 03,020.013c bhūya eva mahābāho prayayau hayasaṃmataḥ 03,020.014a tato bāṇān bahuvidhān punar eva sa saubharāṭ
GE07mbh_03_u:1106: 03,020.014c mumoca tanaye vīre mama rukmiṇinandane 03,020.015a tān aprāptāñ śitair bāṇaiś ciccheda paravīrahā
GE07mbh_03_u:1107: 03,020.015c raukmiṇeyaḥ smitaṃ kṛtvā darśayan hastalāghavam 03,020.016a chinnān dṛṣṭvā tu tān bāṇān pradyumnena sa saubharāṭ 03,020.016c āsurīṃ dāruṇīṃ māyām āsthāya vyasṛjac charān
GE07mbh_03_u:1110: 03,020.018a te tad astraṃ vidhūyāśu vivyadhū rudhirāśanāḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:1111: 03,020.018c śirasy urasi vaktre ca sa mumoha papāta ca 03,020.019a tasmin nipatite kṣudre śālve bāṇaprapīḍite 03,020.019c raukmiṇeyo 'paraṃ bāṇaṃ saṃdadhe śatrunāśanam
GE07mbh_03_u:1112: 03,020.020a tam arcitaṃ sarvadāśārhapūgair; āśīrbhir arkajvalanaprakāśam 03,020.020c dṛṣṭvā śaraṃ jyām abhinīyamānaṃ; babhūva hāhākṛtam antarikṣam
GE07mbh_03_u:1113: 03,020.021a tato devagaṇāḥ sarve sendrāḥ saha dhaneśvarāḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:1114: 03,020.021c nāradaṃ preṣayām āsuḥ śvasanaṃ ca mahābalam
GE07mbh_03_u:1116: 03,020.022c naiṣa vadhyas tvayā vīra śālvarājaḥ kathaṃ cana
GE07mbh_03_u:1117: 03,020.023a saṃharasva punar bāṇam avadhyo 'yaṃ tvayā raṇe 03,020.023c etasya hi śarasyājau nāvadhyo 'sti pumān kva cit
GE07mbh_03_u:1118: 03,020.024a mṛtyur asya mahābāho raṇe devakinandanaḥ 03,020.024c kṛṣṇaḥ saṃkalpito dhātrā tan na mithyā bhaved iti 03,020.025a tataḥ paramasaṃhṛṣṭaḥ pradyumnaḥ śaram uttamam 03,020.025c saṃjahāra dhanuḥśreṣṭhāt tūṇe caiva nyaveśayat 03,020.026a tata utthāya rājendra śālvaḥ paramadurmanāḥ 03,020.026c vyapāyāt sabalas tūrṇaṃ pradyumnaśarapīḍitaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:1119: 03,020.027a sa dvārakāṃ parityajya krūro vṛṣṇibhir arditaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:1120: 03,020.027c saubham āsthāya rājendra divam ācakrame tadā
GE07mbh_03_u:1121: 03,021.001 vāsudeva uvāca 03,021.001a ānartanagaraṃ muktaṃ tato 'ham agamaṃ tadā 03,021.001c mahākratau rājasūye nivṛtte nṛpate tava 03,021.002a apaśyaṃ dvārakāṃ cāhaṃ mahārāja hatatviṣam 03,021.002c niḥsvādhyāyavaṣaṭkārāṃ nirbhūṣaṇavarastriyam 03,021.003a anabhijñeyarūpāṇi dvārakopavanāni ca
GE07mbh_03_u:1122: 03,021.003c dṛṣṭvā śaṅkopapanno 'ham apṛcchaṃ hṛdikātmajam 03,021.004a asvasthanaranārīkam idaṃ vṛṣṇipuraṃ bhṛṣam
GE07mbh_03_u:1123: 03,021.004c kim idaṃ naraśārdūla śrotum icchāmahe vayam
GE07mbh_03_u:1124: 03,021.005a evam uktas tu sa mayā vistareṇedam abravīt
GE07mbh_03_u:1125: 03,021.005c rodhaṃ mokṣaṃ ca śālvena hārdikyo rājasattama
GE07mbh_03_u:1130: 03,021.007e sarvavṛṣṇipravīrāṃś ca harṣayann abruvaṃ tadā 03,021.008a apramādaḥ sadā kāryo nagare yādavarṣabhāḥ 03,021.008c śālvarājavināśāya prayātaṃ māṃ nibodhata
GE07mbh_03_u:1131: 03,021.009a nāhatvā taṃ nivartiṣye purīṃ dvāravatīṃ prati
GE07mbh_03_u:1132: 03,021.009c saśālvaṃ saubhanagaraṃ hatvā draṣṭāsmi vaḥ punaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:1133: 03,021.009e trisāmā hanyatām eṣā dundubhiḥ śatrubhīṣaṇī 03,021.010a te mayāśvāsitā vīrā yathāvad bharatarṣabha 03,021.010c sarve mām abruvan hṛṣṭāḥ prayāhi jahi śātravān
GE07mbh_03_u:1134: 03,021.011a taiḥ prahṛṣṭātmabhir vīrair āśīrbhir abhinanditaḥ 03,021.011c vācayitvā dvijaśreṣṭhān praṇamya śirasāhukam
GE07mbh_03_u:1136: 03,021.012c pradhmāpya śaṅkhapravaraṃ pāñcajanyam ahaṃ nṛpa 03,021.013a prayāto 'smi naravyāghra balena mahatā vṛtaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:1138: 03,021.014a samatītya bahūn deśān girīṃś ca bahupādapān
GE07mbh_03_u:1139: 03,021.014c sarāṃsi saritaś caiva mārttikāvatam āsadam 03,021.015a tatrāśrauṣaṃ naravyāghra śālvaṃ nagaram antikāt 03,021.015c prayātaṃ saubham āsthāya tam ahaṃ pṛṣṭhato 'nvayām
GE07mbh_03_u:1140: 03,021.015d*0080_01 dṛṣṭavān asmi rājendra sālvarājam athāntike 03,021.016a tataḥ sāgaram āsādya kukṣau tasya mahormiṇaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:1142: 03,021.016d*0081_01 sa mām ālokya sahasā senāṃ svāṃ prāhiṇon mṛdhe 03,021.016d*0081_02 madbāhunā ca senāyāṃ śiṣṭāyāṃ kiṃ cid eva ca 03,021.017a sa samālokya dūrān māṃ smayann iva yudhiṣṭhira
GE07mbh_03_u:1143: 03,021.017c āhvayām āsa duṣṭātmā yuddhāyaiva muhur muhuḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:1145: 03,021.018c puraṃ nāsādyata śarais tato māṃ roṣa āviśat
GE07mbh_03_u:1146: 03,021.019a sa cāpi pāpaprakṛtir daiteyāpasado nṛpa 03,021.019c mayy avarṣata durdharṣaḥ śaradhārāḥ sahasraśaḥ 03,021.020a sainikān mama sūtaṃ ca hayāṃś ca samavākirat
GE07mbh_03_u:1147: 03,021.020c acintayantas tu śarān vayaṃ yudhyāma bhārata
GE07mbh_03_u:1149: 03,021.021c cikṣipuḥ samare vīrā mayi śālvapadānugāḥ 03,021.022a te hayān me rathaṃ caiva tadā dārukam eva ca

GE07mbh_03_u:1153: 03,021.025a na tatra viṣayas tv āsīn mama sainyasya bhārata 03,021.025c khe viṣaktaṃ hi tat saubhaṃ krośamātra ivābhavat

GE07mbh_03_u:1158: 03,021.028c vadhyatāṃ viśikhais tīkṣṇaiḥ patatāṃ ca mahārṇave

GE07mbh_03_u:1162: 03,021.031c māyāyuddhena mahatā yodhayām āsa māṃ yudhi

GE07mbh_03_u:1166: 03,021.033a tān ahaṃ māyayaivāśu pratigṛhya vyanāśayam 03,021.033c tasyāṃ hatāyāṃ māyāyāṃ giriśṛṅgair ayodhayat 03,021.034a tato 'bhavat tama iva prabhātam iva cābhavat 03,021.034c durdinaṃ sudinaṃ caiva śītam uṣṇaṃ ca bhārata
GE07mbh_03_u:1167: 03,021.034d*0084_01 aṅgārapāṃśuvarṣaṃ ca śastravarṣaṃ ca bhārata 03,021.035a evaṃ māyāṃ vikurvāṇo yodhayām āsa māṃ ripuḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:1168: 03,021.035c vijñāya tad ahaṃ sarvaṃ māyayaiva vyanāśayam

GE07mbh_03_u:1173: 03,021.037a tato nājñāyata tadā divārātraṃ tathā diśaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:1175: 03,021.037e tatas tad astram astreṇa vidhūtaṃ śaratūlavat
GE07mbh_03_u:1176: 03,021.038a tathā tad abhavad yuddhaṃ tumulaṃ lomaharṣaṇam
GE07mbh_03_u:1177: 03,021.038c labdhālokaś ca rājendra punaḥ śatrum ayodhayam
GE07mbh_03_u:1178: 03,022.001 vāsudeva uvāca 03,022.001a evaṃ sa puruṣavyāghra śālvo rājñāṃ mahāripuḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:1179: 03,022.001c yudhyamāno mayā saṃkhye viyad abhyāgamat punaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:1180: 03,022.002a tataḥ śataghnīś ca mahāgadāś ca; dīptāṃś ca śūlān musalān asīṃś ca
GE07mbh_03_u:1181: 03,022.002c cikṣepa roṣān mayi mandabuddhiḥ; śālvo mahārāja jayābhikāṅkṣī
GE07mbh_03_u:1182: 03,022.003a tān āśugair āpatato 'ham āśu; nivārya tūrṇaṃ khagamān kha eva 03,022.003c dvidhā tridhā cācchinam āśu muktais; tato 'ntarikṣe ninado babhūva 03,022.004a tataḥ śatasahasreṇa śarāṇāṃ nataparvaṇām
GE07mbh_03_u:1183: 03,022.004c dārukaṃ vājinaś caiva rathaṃ ca samavākirat
GE07mbh_03_u:1184: 03,022.005a tato mām abravīd vīra dāruko vihvalann iva
GE07mbh_03_u:1186: 03,022.005d*0086_01 avasthātuṃ na śakyāmi aṅgaṃ me vyavasīdati

GE07mbh_03_u:1196: 03,022.012a dvārakādhipatir vīra āha tvām āhuko vacaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:1199: 03,022.013c viṣakte tvayi durdharṣa hataḥ śūrasuto balāt
GE07mbh_03_u:1200: 03,022.014a tad alaṃ sādhu yuddhena nivartasva janārdana
GE07mbh_03_u:1201: 03,022.014c dvārakām eva rakṣasva kāryam etan mahat tava

GE07mbh_03_u:1204: 03,022.016a sātyakiṃ baladevaṃ ca pradyumnaṃ ca mahāratham
GE07mbh_03_u:1205: 03,022.016c jagarhe manasā vīra tac chrutvā vipriyaṃ vacaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:1206: 03,022.017a ahaṃ hi dvārakāyāś ca pituś ca kurunandana
GE07mbh_03_u:1207: 03,022.017c teṣu rakṣāṃ samādhāya prayātaḥ saubhapātane 03,022.018a baladevo mahābāhuḥ kaccij jīvati śatruhā 03,022.018c sātyakī raukmiṇeyaś ca cārudeṣṇaś ca vīryavān
GE07mbh_03_u:1208: 03,022.018e sāmbaprabhṛtayaś caivety aham āsaṃ sudurmanāḥ 03,022.019a eteṣu hi naravyāghra jīvatsu na kathaṃ cana
GE07mbh_03_u:1209: 03,022.019c śakyaḥ śūrasuto hantum api vajrabhṛtā svayam

GE07mbh_03_u:1215: 03,022.023c yayāteḥ kṣīṇapuṇyasya svargād iva mahītalam 03,022.024a viśīrṇagalitoṣṇīṣaḥ prakīrṇāmbaramūrdhajaḥ 03,022.024c prapatan dṛśyate ha sma kṣīṇapuṇya iva grahaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:1216: 03,022.025a tataḥ śārṅgaṃ dhanuḥśreṣṭhaṃ karāt prapatitaṃ mama

GE07mbh_03_u:1218: 03,022.026a tato hāhākṛtaṃ sarvaṃ sainyaṃ me gatacetanam

GE07mbh_03_u:1220: 03,022.027a prasārya bāhū patataḥ prasārya caraṇāv api
GE07mbh_03_u:1221: 03,022.027c rūpaṃ pitur apaśyaṃ tac chakuneḥ patato yathā
GE07mbh_03_u:1223: 03,022.028c abhighnanto bhṛśaṃ vīrā mama ceto vyakampayan

GE07mbh_03_u:1225: 03,022.029c na tatra saubhaṃ na ripuṃ na śālvaṃ; paśyāmi vṛddhaṃ pitaraṃ

GE07mbh_03_u:1247: 03,023.014c dyauś ca bhūmiś ca khaṃ caivādṛśyamāne tathā mayi 03,023.015a tato viṣaṇṇamanaso mama rājan suhṛjjanāḥ 03,023.015c ruruduś cukruśuś caiva duḥkhaśokasamanvitāḥ

GE07mbh_03_u:1263: 03,023.024d*0088_01 jitavāñ jāmadagnyaṃ yaḥ koṭivarṣagaṇān bahūn 03,023.024d*0088_02 sa eṣa nānyair vadhyo hi tvām ṛte naiva kaiś cana

GE07mbh_03_u:1272: 03,023.030c abhimantryāham atulaṃ dviṣatāṃ ca nibarhaṇam 03,023.031a jahi saubhaṃ svavīryeṇa ye cātra ripavo mama

GE07mbh_03_u:1276: 03,023.034a dvidhā kṛtaṃ tataḥ saubhaṃ sudarśanabalād dhatam
GE07mbh_03_u:1278: 03,023.035a tasmin nipatite saubhe cakram āgāt karaṃ mama

GE07mbh_03_u:1280: 03,023.036a tataḥ śālvaṃ gadāṃ gurvīm āvidhyantaṃ mahāhave
GE07mbh_03_u:1281: 03,023.036c dvidhā cakāra sahasā prajajvāla ca tejasā

GE07mbh_03_u:1284: 03,023.038c śaṅkhaṃ pradhmāpya harṣeṇa suhṛdaḥ paryaharṣayam 03,023.039a tan meruśikharākāraṃ
GE07mbh_03_u:1285: 03,023.039c dahyamānam abhiprekṣya striyas tāḥ saṃpradudruvuḥ 03,023.040a evaṃ nihatya samare śālvaṃ saubhaṃ nipātya ca
GE07mbh_03_u:1286: 03,023.040c ānartān punar āgamya suhṛdāṃ prītim āvaham
GE07mbh_03_u:1287: 03,023.041a etasmāt kāraṇād rājan nāgamaṃ nāgasāhvayam 03,023.041c yady agāṃ paravīraghna na hi jīvet suyodhanaḥ

GE07mbh_03_u:1296: 03,023.048c āmantrya pāṇḍavān sarvān prayayus te 'pi bhārata
GE07mbh_03_u:1297: 03,023.049a brāhmaṇāś ca viśaś caiva tathā viṣayavāsinaḥ

GE07mbh_03_u:1302: 03,024.001 vaiśaṃpāyana uvāca 03,024.001a tasmin daśārhādhipatau prayāte; yudhiṣṭhiro bhīmasenārjunau
GE07mbh_03_u:1303: 03,024.001c yamau ca kṛṣṇā ca purohitaś ca; rathān mahārhān paramāśvayuktān
GE07mbh_03_u:1304: 03,024.002a āsthāya vīrāḥ sahitā vanāya; pratasthire bhūtapatiprakāśāḥ 03,024.002c hiraṇyaniṣkān vasanāni gāś ca; pradāya śikṣākṣaramantravidbhyaḥ 03,024.003a preṣyāḥ puro viṃśatir āttaśastrā; dhanūṃṣi varmāṇi śarāṃś ca pītān 03,024.003c maurvīś ca yantrāṇi ca sāyakāṃś ca; sarve samādāya jaghanyam
GE07mbh_03_u:1306: 03,024.004a tatas tu vāsāṃsi ca rājaputryā; dhātryaś ca dāsyaś ca vibhūṣaṇaṃ ca
GE07mbh_03_u:1307: 03,024.004c tad indrasenas tvaritaṃ pragṛhya; jaghanyam evopayayau rathena
GE07mbh_03_u:1308: 03,024.005a tataḥ kuruśreṣṭham upetya paurāḥ; pradakṣiṇaṃ cakrur adīnasattvāḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:1309: 03,024.005c taṃ brāhmaṇāś cābhyavadan prasannā; mukhyāś ca sarve
GE07mbh_03_u:1311: 03,024.006a sa cāpi tān abhyavadat prasannaḥ; sahaiva tair bhrātṛbhir
GE07mbh_03_u:1313: 03,024.006c tasthau ca tatrādhipatir mahātmā; dṛṣṭvā janaughaṃ kurujāṅgalānām
GE07mbh_03_u:1314: 03,024.007a piteva putreṣu sa teṣu bhāvaṃ; cakre kurūṇām ṛṣabho mahātmā
GE07mbh_03_u:1315: 03,024.007c te cāpi tasmin bharataprabarhe; tadā babhūvuḥ pitarīva putrāḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:1316: 03,024.008a tataḥ samāsādya mahājanaughāḥ; kurupravīraṃ parivārya tasthuḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:1317: 03,024.008c hā nātha hā dharma iti bruvanto; hriyā ca sarve 'śrumukhā
GE07mbh_03_u:1319: 03,024.009a varaḥ kurūṇām adhipaḥ prajānāṃ; piteva putrān apahāya cāsmān
GE07mbh_03_u:1320: 03,024.009c paurān imāñ jānapadāṃś ca sarvān; hitvā prayātaḥ kva nu dharmarājaḥ 03,024.010a dhig dhārtarāṣṭraṃ sunṛśaṃsabuddhiṃ; sasaubalaṃ pāpamatiṃ ca
GE07mbh_03_u:1322: 03,024.010c anartham icchanti narendra pāpā; ye dharmanityasya satas
GE07mbh_03_u:1324: 03,024.011a svayaṃ niveśyāpratimaṃ mahātmā; puraṃ mahad devapuraprakāśam
GE07mbh_03_u:1325: 03,024.011c śatakratuprastham amoghakarmā; hitvā prayātaḥ kva nu dharmarājaḥ 03,024.012a cakāra yām apratimāṃ mahātmā; sabhāṃ mayo devasabhāprakāśām
GE07mbh_03_u:1326: 03,024.012c tāṃ devaguptām iva devamāyāṃ; hitvā prayātaḥ kva nu dharmarājaḥ 03,024.013a tān dharmakāmārthavid uttamaujā; bībhatsur uccaiḥ sahitān
GE07mbh_03_u:1328: 03,024.013c ādāsyate vāsam imaṃ niruṣya; vaneṣu rājā dviṣatāṃ yaśāṃsi
GE07mbh_03_u:1329: 03,024.014a dvijātimukhyāḥ sahitāḥ pṛthak ca; bhavadbhir āsādya tapasvinaś
GE07mbh_03_u:1331: 03,024.014c prasādya dharmārthavidaś ca vācyā; yathārthasiddhiḥ paramā bhaven naḥ 03,024.015a ity evam ukte vacane 'rjunena; te brāhmaṇāḥ sarvavarṇāś ca rājan 03,024.015c mudābhyanandan sahitāś ca cakruḥ; pradakṣiṇaṃ dharmabhṛtāṃ variṣṭham
GE07mbh_03_u:1332: 03,024.016a āmantrya pārthaṃ ca vṛkodaraṃ ca; dhanaṃjayaṃ yājñasenīṃ yamau
GE07mbh_03_u:1334: 03,024.016c pratasthire rāṣṭram apetaharṣā; yudhiṣṭhireṇānumatā yathāsvam 03,025.001 vaiśaṃpāyana uvāca 03,025.001a tatas teṣu prayāteṣu kaunteyaḥ satyasaṃgaraḥ 03,025.001c abhyabhāṣata dharmātmā bhrātṝn sarvān yudhiṣṭhiraḥ 03,025.002a dvādaśemāḥ samāsmābhir vastavyaṃ nirjane vane 03,025.002c samīkṣadhvaṃ mahāraṇye deśaṃ bahumṛgadvijam
GE07mbh_03_u:1336: 03,025.003c yatremāḥ śaradaḥ sarvāḥ sukhaṃ prativasemahi 03,025.004a evam ukte pratyuvāca dharmarājaṃ dhanaṃjayaḥ 03,025.004c guruvan mānavaguruṃ mānayitvā manasvinam
GE07mbh_03_u:1337: 03,025.005 arjuna uvāca 03,025.005a bhavān eva maharṣīṇāṃ vṛddhānāṃ paryupāsitā 03,025.005c ajñātaṃ mānuṣe loke bhavato nāsti kiṃ cana
GE07mbh_03_u:1338: 03,025.006a tvayā hy upāsitā nityaṃ brāhmaṇā bharatarṣabha
GE07mbh_03_u:1340: 03,025.007a yaḥ sarvalokadvārāṇi nityaṃ saṃcarate vaśī 03,025.007c devalokād brahmalokaṃ gandharvāpsarasām api
GE07mbh_03_u:1341: 03,025.008a sarvā gatīr vijānāsi brāhmaṇānāṃ na saṃśayaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:1342: 03,025.008c prabhāvāṃś caiva vettha tvaṃ sarveṣām eva pārthiva
GE07mbh_03_u:1343: 03,025.009a tvam eva rājañ jānāsi śreyaḥkāraṇam eva ca
GE07mbh_03_u:1344: 03,025.009c yatrecchasi mahārāja nivāsaṃ tatra kurmahe 03,025.010a idaṃ dvaitavanaṃ nāma saraḥ puṇyajanocitam 03,025.010c bahupuṣpaphalaṃ ramyaṃ nānādvijaniṣevitam
GE07mbh_03_u:1345: 03,025.011a atremā dvādaśa samā viharemeti rocaye 03,025.011c yadi te 'numataṃ rājan kiṃ vānyan manyate bhavān 03,025.012 yudhiṣṭhira uvāca 03,025.012a mamāpy etan mataṃ pārtha tvayā yat samudāhṛtam
GE07mbh_03_u:1346: 03,025.012c gacchāma puṇyaṃ vikhyātaṃ mahad dvaitavanaṃ saraḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:1347: 03,025.013 vaiśaṃpāyana uvāca 03,025.013a tatas te prayayuḥ sarve pāṇḍavā dharmacāriṇaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:1348: 03,025.013c brāhmaṇair bahubhiḥ sārdhaṃ puṇyaṃ dvaitavanaṃ saraḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:1349: 03,025.014a brāhmaṇāḥ sāgnihotrāś ca tathaiva ca niragnayaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:1350: 03,025.014c svādhyāyino bhikṣavaś ca sajapā vanavāsinaḥ 03,025.015a bahavo brāhmaṇās tatra parivavrur yudhiṣṭhiram 03,025.015c tapasvinaḥ satyaśīlāḥ śataśaḥ saṃśitavratāḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:1351: 03,025.016a te yātvā pāṇḍavās tatra bahubhir brāhmaṇaiḥ saha
GE07mbh_03_u:1352: 03,025.016c puṇyaṃ dvaitavanaṃ ramyaṃ viviśur bharatarṣabhāḥ 03,025.017a tac chālatālāmramadhūkanīpa;
GE07mbh_03_u:1353: 03,025.017c tapātyaye puṣpadharair upetaṃ; mahāvanaṃ rāṣṭrapatir dadarśa
GE07mbh_03_u:1354: 03,025.018a mahādrumāṇāṃ śikhareṣu tasthur; manoramāṃ vācam udīrayantaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:1356: 03,025.019a kareṇuyūthaiḥ saha yūthapānāṃ; madotkaṭānām acalaprabhāṇām 03,025.019c mahānti yūthāni mahādvipānāṃ; tasmin vane rāṣṭrapatir dadarśa
GE07mbh_03_u:1357: 03,025.020a manoramāṃ bhogavatīm upetya; dhṛtātmanāṃ cīrajaṭādharāṇām 03,025.020c tasmin vane dharmabhṛtāṃ nivāse; dadarśa siddharṣigaṇān anekān
GE07mbh_03_u:1358: 03,025.021a tataḥ sa yānād avaruhya rājā; sabhrātṛkaḥ sajanaḥ kānanaṃ tat
GE07mbh_03_u:1359: 03,025.021c viveśa dharmātmavatāṃ variṣṭhas; triviṣṭapaṃ śakra ivāmitaujāḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:1360: 03,025.022a taṃ satyasaṃdhaṃ sahitābhipetur; didṛkṣavaś cāraṇasiddhasaṃghāḥ 03,025.022c vanaukasaś cāpi narendrasiṃhaṃ; manasvinaṃ saṃparivārya tasthuḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:1361: 03,025.023a sa tatra siddhān abhivādya sarvān; pratyarcito rājavad devavac
GE07mbh_03_u:1363: 03,025.023c viveśa sarvaiḥ sahito dvijāgryaiḥ; kṛtāñjalir dharmabhṛtāṃ variṣṭhaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:1364: 03,025.024a sa puṇyaśīlaḥ pitṛvan mahātmā; tapasvibhir dharmaparair upetya
GE07mbh_03_u:1365: 03,025.024c pratyarcitaḥ puṣpadharasya mūle; mahādrumasyopaviveśa rājā 03,025.025a bhīmaś ca kṛṣṇā ca dhanaṃjayaś ca; yamau ca te cānucarā narendram 03,025.025c vimucya vāhān avaruhya sarve; tatropatasthur bharataprabarhāḥ 03,025.026a latāvatānāvanataḥ sa pāṇḍavair; mahādrumaḥ pañcabhir ugradhanvibhiḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:1366: 03,025.026c babhau nivāsopagatair mahātmabhir; mahāgirir vāraṇayūthapair iva
GE07mbh_03_u:1367: 03,026.001 vaiśaṃpāyana uvāca 03,026.001a tat kānanaṃ prāpya narendraputrāḥ; sukhocitā vāsam upetya
GE07mbh_03_u:1369: 03,026.001c vijahrur indrapratimāḥ śiveṣu; sarasvatīśālavaneṣu teṣu 03,026.002a yatīṃś ca sarvān sa munīṃś ca rājā; tasmin vane mūlaphalair
GE07mbh_03_u:1371: 03,026.002c dvijātimukhyān ṛṣabhaḥ kurūṇāṃ; saṃtarpayām āsa mahānubhāvaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:1372: 03,026.003a iṣṭīś ca pitryāṇi tathāgriyāṇi; mahāvane vasatāṃ pāṇḍavānām
GE07mbh_03_u:1373: 03,026.003c purohitaḥ sarvasamṛddhatejāś; cakāra dhaumyaḥ pitṛvat kurūṇām
GE07mbh_03_u:1374: 03,026.004a apetya rāṣṭrād vasatāṃ tu teṣām; ṛṣiḥ purāṇo 'tithir ājagāma
GE07mbh_03_u:1375: 03,026.004c tam āśramaṃ tīvrasamṛddhatejā; mārkaṇḍeyaḥ śrīmatāṃ pāṇḍavānām
GE07mbh_03_u:1379: 03,026.005a sa sarvavid draupadīṃ prekṣya kṛṣṇāṃ; yudhiṣṭhiraṃ bhīmasenārjunau ca
GE07mbh_03_u:1381: 03,026.006a taṃ dharmarājo vimanā ivābravīt; sarve hriyā santi tapasvino
GE07mbh_03_u:1383: 03,026.006c bhavān idaṃ kiṃ smayatīva hṛṣṭas; tapasvināṃ paśyatāṃ mām
GE07mbh_03_u:1385: 03,026.007 mārkaṇḍeya uvāca 03,026.007a na tāta hṛṣyāmi na ca smayāmi; praharṣajo māṃ bhajate na darpaḥ 03,026.007c tavāpadaṃ tv adya samīkṣya rāmaṃ; satyavrataṃ dāśarathiṃ smarāmi
GE07mbh_03_u:1386: 03,026.008a sa cāpi rājā saha lakṣmaṇena; vane nivāsaṃ pitur eva śāsanāt 03,026.008c dhanvī caran pārtha purā mayaiva; dṛṣṭo girer ṛṣyamūkasya
GE07mbh_03_u:1388: 03,026.009a sahasranetrapratimo mahātmā; mayasya jeta namuceś ca hantā 03,026.009c pitur nideśād anaghaḥ svadharmaṃ; vane vāsaṃ dāśarathiś cakāra
GE07mbh_03_u:1389: 03,026.010a sa cāpi śakrasya samaprabhāvo; mahānubhāvaḥ samareṣv ajeyaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:1390: 03,026.010c vihāya bhogān acarad vaneṣu; neśe balasyeti cared adharmam
GE07mbh_03_u:1391: 03,026.011a nṛpāś ca nābhāgabhagīrathādayo; mahīm imāṃ sāgarāntāṃ vijitya
GE07mbh_03_u:1392: 03,026.011c satyena te 'py ajayaṃs tāta lokān; neśe balasyeti cared
GE07mbh_03_u:1394: 03,026.012a alarkam āhur naravarya santaṃ; satyavrataṃ kāśikarūṣarājam 03,026.012c vihāya rāṣṭrāṇi vasūni caiva; neśe balasyeti cared adharmam
GE07mbh_03_u:1395: 03,026.013a dhātrā vidhir yo vihitaḥ purāṇas; taṃ pūjayanto naravarya
GE07mbh_03_u:1397: 03,026.013c saptarṣayaḥ pārtha divi prabhānti; neśe balasyeti cared
GE07mbh_03_u:1399: 03,026.014a mahābalān parvatakūṭamātrān; viṣāṇinaḥ paśya gajān narendra
GE07mbh_03_u:1400: 03,026.014c sthitān nideśe naravarya dhātur; neśe balasyeti cared adharmam
GE07mbh_03_u:1401: 03,026.015a sarvāṇi bhūtāni narendra paśya; yathā yathāvad vihitaṃ
GE07mbh_03_u:1403: 03,026.015c svayonitas tat kurute prabhāvān; neśe balasyeti cared adharmam
GE07mbh_03_u:1404: 03,026.016a satyena dharmeṇa yathārhavṛttyā; hriyā tathā sarvabhūtāny
GE07mbh_03_u:1406: 03,026.016c yaśaś ca tejaś ca tavāpi dīptaṃ; vibhāvasor bhāskarasyeva pārtha
GE07mbh_03_u:1407: 03,026.017a yathāpratijñaṃ ca mahānubhāva; kṛcchraṃ vane vāsam imaṃ niruṣya 03,026.017c tataḥ śriyaṃ tejasā svena dīptām; ādāsyase pārthiva kauravebhyaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:1408: 03,026.018 vaiśaṃpāyana uvāca 03,026.018a tam evam uktvā vacanaṃ maharṣis; tapasvimadhye sahitaṃ suhṛdbhiḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:1409: 03,026.018c āmantrya dhaumyaṃ sahitāṃś ca pārthāṃs; tataḥ pratasthe diśam
GE07mbh_03_u:1410: uttarāṃ saḥ 03,027.001 vaiśaṃpāyana uvāca 03,027.001a vasatsv atha dvaitavane pāṇḍaveṣu mahātmasu 03,027.001c anukīrṇaṃ mahāraṇyaṃ brāhmaṇaiḥ samapadyata
GE07mbh_03_u:1412: 03,027.002c brahmalokasamaṃ puṇyam āsīd dvaitavanaṃ saraḥ 03,027.003a yajuṣām ṛcāṃ ca sāmnāṃ ca gadyānāṃ caiva sarvaśaḥ 03,027.003c āsīd uccāryamāṇānāṃ nisvano hṛdayaṃgamaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:1413: 03,027.004a jyāghoṣaḥ pāṇḍaveyānāṃ brahmaghoṣaś ca dhīmatām 03,027.004c saṃsṛṣṭaṃ brahmaṇā kṣatraṃ bhūya eva vyarocata
GE07mbh_03_u:1414: 03,027.005a athābravīd bako dālbhyo dharmarājaṃ yudhiṣṭhiram 03,027.005c saṃdhyāṃ kaunteyam āsīnam ṛṣibhiḥ parivāritam 03,027.006a paśya dvaitavane pārtha brāhmaṇānāṃ tapasvinām 03,027.006c homavelāṃ kuruśreṣṭha saṃprajvalitapāvakām
GE07mbh_03_u:1415: 03,027.007a caranti dharmaṃ puṇye 'smiṃs tvayā guptā dhṛtavratāḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:1417: 03,027.008a āgastyāś ca mahābhāgā ātreyāś cottamavratāḥ 03,027.008c sarvasya jagataḥ śreṣṭhā brāhmaṇāḥ saṃgatās tvayā
GE07mbh_03_u:1418: 03,027.009a idaṃ tu vacanaṃ pārtha śṛṇv ekāgramanā mama
GE07mbh_03_u:1419: 03,027.009c bhrātṛbhiḥ saha kaunteya yat tvāṃ vakṣyāmi kaurava
GE07mbh_03_u:1420: 03,027.010a brahma kṣatreṇa saṃsṛṣṭaṃ kṣatraṃ ca brahmaṇā saha
GE07mbh_03_u:1422: 03,027.011a nābrāhmaṇas tāta ciraṃ bubhūṣed; icchann imaṃ lokam amuṃ ca jetum
GE07mbh_03_u:1423: 03,027.011c vinītadharmārtham apetamohaṃ; labdhvā dvijaṃ nudati nṛpaḥ sapatnān 03,027.012a caran naiḥśreyasaṃ dharmaṃ prajāpālanakāritam
GE07mbh_03_u:1424: 03,027.012c nādhyagacchad balir loke tīrtham anyatra vai dvijāt
GE07mbh_03_u:1425: 03,027.013a anūnam āsīd asurasya kāmair; vairocaneḥ śrīr api cākṣayāsīt
GE07mbh_03_u:1426: 03,027.013c labdhvā mahīṃ brāhmaṇasaṃprayogāt; teṣv ācaran duṣṭam ato vyanaśyat 03,027.014a nābrāhmaṇaṃ bhūmir iyaṃ sabhūtir; varṇaṃ dvitīyaṃ bhajate
GE07mbh_03_u:1428: 03,027.014c samudranemir namate tu tasmai; yaṃ brāhmaṇaḥ śāsti nayair vinītaḥ 03,027.015a kuñjarasyeva saṃgrāme 'parigṛhyāṅkuśagraham
GE07mbh_03_u:1429: 03,027.015c brāhmaṇair viprahīṇasya kṣatrasya kṣīyate balam 03,027.016a brahmaṇy anupamā dṛṣṭiḥ kṣātram apratimaṃ balam
GE07mbh_03_u:1430: 03,027.016c tau yadā carataḥ sārdham atha lokaḥ prasīdati
GE07mbh_03_u:1431: 03,027.017a yathā hi sumahān agniḥ kakṣaṃ dahati sānilaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:1432: 03,027.017c tathā dahati rājanyo brāhmaṇena samaṃ ripūn
GE07mbh_03_u:1434: 03,027.018c alabdhasya ca lābhāya labdhasya ca vivṛddhaye
GE07mbh_03_u:1436: 03,027.019c yaśasvinaṃ vedavidaṃ vipaścitaṃ; bahuśrutaṃ brāhmaṇam eva
GE07mbh_03_u:1438: 03,027.020a brāhmaṇeṣūttamā vṛttis tava nityaṃ yudhiṣṭhira 03,027.020c tena te sarvalokeṣu dīpyate prathitaṃ yaśaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:1439: 03,027.021a tatas te brāhmaṇāḥ sarve bakaṃ dālbhyam apūjayan
GE07mbh_03_u:1441: 03,027.022a dvaipāyano nāradaś ca jāmadagnyaḥ pṛthuśravāḥ 03,027.022c indradyumno bhālukiś ca kṛtacetāḥ sahasrapāt 03,027.023a karṇaśravāś ca muñjaś ca lavaṇāśvaś ca kāśyapaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:1443: 03,027.024a ṛtavāk ca suvāk caiva bṛhadaśva ṛtāvasuḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:1445: 03,027.025a ete cānye ca bahavo brāhmaṇāḥ saṃśitavratāḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:1447: 03,028.001 vaiśaṃpāyana uvāca 03,028.001a tato vanagatāḥ pārthāḥ sāyāhne saha kṛṣṇayā
GE07mbh_03_u:1449: 03,028.002a priyā ca darśanīyā ca paṇḍitā ca pativratā
GE07mbh_03_u:1450: 03,028.002c tataḥ kṛṣṇā dharmarājam idaṃ vacanam abravīt
GE07mbh_03_u:1451: 03,028.003a na nūnaṃ tasya pāpasya duḥkham asmāsu kiṃ cana 03,028.003c vidyate dhārtarāṣṭrasya nṛśaṃsasya durātmanaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:1452: 03,028.004a yas tvāṃ rājan mayā sārdham ajinaiḥ prativāsitam
GE07mbh_03_u:1453: 03,028.004c bhrātṛbhiś ca tathā sarvair nābhyabhāṣata kiṃ cana

GE07mbh_03_u:7509: 03,130.018c abhyagacchata rājānaṃ jñātum agniś ca bhārata
GE07mbh_03_u:7512: 03,130.020a ūruṃ rājñaḥ samāsādya kapotaḥ śyenajād bhayāt
GE07mbh_03_u:7513: 03,130.020c śaraṇārthī tadā rājan nililye bhayapīḍitaḥ 03,131.000*0641_01 śṛṇu tvaṃ tatra vai rājañ śyeno yad abhibhāṣata 03,131.001 śyena uvāca 03,131.001a dharmātmānaṃ tv āhur ekaṃ sarve rājan mahīkṣitaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:7514: 03,131.001c sa vai dharmaviruddhaṃ tvaṃ kasmāt karma cikīrṣasi
GE07mbh_03_u:7515: 03,131.002a vihitaṃ bhakṣaṇaṃ rājan pīḍyamānasya me kṣudhā
GE07mbh_03_u:7516: 03,131.002c mā bhāṅkṣīr dharmalobhena dharmam utsṛṣṭavān asi
GE07mbh_03_u:7518: 03,131.003a saṃtrastarūpas trāṇārthī tvatto bhīto mahādvija 03,131.003c matsakāśam anuprāptaḥ prāṇagṛdhnur ayaṃ dvijaḥ 03,131.004a evam abhyāgatasyeha kapotasyābhayārthinaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:7519: 03,131.004c apradāne paro 'dharmaḥ kiṃ tvaṃ śyena prapaśyasi
GE07mbh_03_u:7520: 03,131.005a praspandamānaḥ saṃbhrāntaḥ kapotaḥ śyena lakṣyate 03,131.005c matsakāśaṃ jīvitārthī tasya tyāgo vigarhitaḥ 03,131.005d*0642_01 yo hi kaś cid dvijān hanyād gāṃ vā lokasya mātaram
GE07mbh_03_u:7521: 03,131.005d*0642_02 śaraṇāgataṃ ca tyajate tulyaṃ teṣāṃ hi pātakam
GE07mbh_03_u:7524: 03,131.006 śyena uvāca 03,131.006a āhārāt sarvabhūtāni saṃbhavanti mahīpate
GE07mbh_03_u:7525: 03,131.006c āhāreṇa vivardhante tena jīvanti jantavaḥ 03,131.007a śakyate dustyaje 'py arthe cirarātrāya jīvitum
GE07mbh_03_u:7526: 03,131.007c na tu bhojanam utsṛjya śakyaṃ vartayituṃ ciram
GE07mbh_03_u:7527: 03,131.008a bhakṣyād vilopitasyādya mama prāṇā viśāṃ pate
GE07mbh_03_u:7528: 03,131.008c visṛjya kāyam eṣyanti panthānam apunarbhavam 03,131.009a pramṛte mayi dharmātman putradāraṃ naśiṣyati 03,131.009c rakṣamāṇaḥ kapotaṃ tvaṃ bahūn prāṇān naśiṣyasi
GE07mbh_03_u:7529: 03,131.010a dharmaṃ yo bādhate dharmo na sa dharmaḥ kudharma tat
GE07mbh_03_u:7530: 03,131.010c avirodhī tu yo dharmaḥ sa dharmaḥ satyavikrama
GE07mbh_03_u:7532: 03,131.011c na bādhā vidyate yatra taṃ dharmaṃ samudācaret
GE07mbh_03_u:7534: 03,131.012c yato bhūyāṃs tato rājan kuru dharmaviniścayam
GE07mbh_03_u:7537: 03,131.013c suparṇaḥ pakṣirāṭ kiṃ tvaṃ dharmajñaś cāsy asaṃśayam
GE07mbh_03_u:7538: 03,131.013e tathā hi dharmasaṃyuktaṃ bahu citraṃ prabhāṣase
GE07mbh_03_u:7539: 03,131.014a na te 'sty aviditaṃ kiṃ cid iti tvā lakṣayāmy aham
GE07mbh_03_u:7540: 03,131.014c śaraṇaiṣiṇaḥ parityāgaṃ kathaṃ sādhv iti manyase
GE07mbh_03_u:7541: 03,131.014d*0644_01 hriyamāṇaṃ tathāhāram utpannaṃ kṣudhitasya vai 03,131.015a āhārārthaṃ samārambhas tava cāyaṃ vihaṃgama 03,131.015c śakyaś cāpy anyathā kartum āhāro 'py adhikas tvayā 03,131.016a govṛṣo vā varāho vā mṛgo vā mahiṣo 'pi vā
GE07mbh_03_u:7542: 03,131.016c tvadartham adya kriyatāṃ yad vānyad abhikāṅkṣase
GE07mbh_03_u:7543: 03,131.017 śyena uvāca 03,131.017a na varāhaṃ na cokṣāṇaṃ na mṛgān vividhāṃs tathā 03,131.017c bhakṣayāmi mahārāja kim annādyena tena me
GE07mbh_03_u:7544: 03,131.018a yas tu me daivavihito bhakṣaḥ kṣatriyapuṃgava
GE07mbh_03_u:7545: 03,131.018c tam utsṛja mahīpāla kapotam imam eva me
GE07mbh_03_u:7546: 03,131.019a śyenāḥ kapotān khādanti sthitir eṣā sanātanī
GE07mbh_03_u:7547: 03,131.019c mā rājan mārgam ājñāya kadalīskandham āruha
GE07mbh_03_u:7549: 03,131.020a rājyaṃ śibīnām ṛddhaṃ vai śādhi pakṣigaṇārcita
GE07mbh_03_u:7550: 03,131.020b*0645_01 kṛtsnam etan mayā dattaṃ rājavad vihagottama
GE07mbh_03_u:7551: 03,131.020c yad vā kāmayase kiṃ cic chyena sarvaṃ dadāni te
GE07mbh_03_u:7552: 03,131.020e vinemaṃ pakṣiṇaṃ śyena śaraṇārthinam āgatam 03,131.021a yenemaṃ varjayethās tvaṃ karmaṇā pakṣisattama 03,131.021c tad ācakṣva kariṣyāmi na hi dāsye kapotakam
GE07mbh_03_u:7553: 03,131.022 śyena uvāca 03,131.022a uśīnara kapote te yadi sneho narādhipa
GE07mbh_03_u:7554: 03,131.022c ātmano māṃsam utkṛtya kapotatulayā dhṛtam 03,131.023a yadā samaṃ kapotena tava māṃsaṃ bhaven nṛpa
GE07mbh_03_u:7555: 03,131.023c tadā pradeyaṃ tan mahyaṃ sā me tuṣṭir bhaviṣyati 03,131.024 rājovāca
GE07mbh_03_u:7556: 03,131.024a anugraham imaṃ manye śyena yan mābhiyācase
GE07mbh_03_u:7557: 03,131.024c tasmāt te 'dya pradāsyāmi svamāṃsaṃ tulayā dhṛtam
GE07mbh_03_u:7559: 03,131.024d*0646_02 tataḥ kim upacāro 'sya pratyahe kriyate vṛthā
GE07mbh_03_u:7560: 03,131.025 lomaśa uvāca 03,131.025a athotkṛtya svamāṃsaṃ tu rājā paramadharmavit 03,131.025c tulayām āsa kaunteya kapotena sahābhibho 03,131.026a dhriyamāṇas tu tulayā kapoto vyatiricyate 03,131.026c punaś cotkṛtya māṃsāni rājā prādād uśīnaraḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:7561: 03,131.027a na vidyate yadā māṃsaṃ kapotena samaṃ dhṛtam
GE07mbh_03_u:7563: 03,131.028 śyena uvāca 03,131.028a indro 'ham asmi dharmajña kapoto havyavāḍ ayam 03,131.028c jijñāsamānau dharme tvāṃ yajñavāṭam upāgatau 03,131.029a yat te māṃsāni gātrebhya utkṛttāni viśāṃ pate
GE07mbh_03_u:7564: 03,131.029c eṣā te bhāsvarī kīrtir lokān abhibhaviṣyati
GE07mbh_03_u:7565: 03,131.030a yāval loke manuṣyās tvāṃ kathayiṣyanti pārthiva
GE07mbh_03_u:7566: 03,131.030c tāvat kīrtiś ca lokāś ca sthāsyanti tava śāśvatāḥ 03,131.030d*0647_01 ity evam uktvā rājānam āruroha divaṃ punaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:7569: 03,131.031 lomaśa uvāca 03,131.031*0648_01 ity uktvā taṃ dānapatim indrāgnī tau tadā nṛpa 03,131.031*0648_02 pūrṇadehaṃ svakaṃ kṛtvā jagmatus tridaśālayam 03,131.031a tat pāṇḍaveya sadanaṃ rājñas tasya mahātmanaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:7570: 03,131.031c paśyasvaitan mayā sārdhaṃ puṇyaṃ pāpapramocanam 03,131.032a atra vai satataṃ devā munayaś ca sanātanāḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:7571: 03,131.032c dṛśyante brāhmaṇai rājan puṇyavadbhir mahātmabhiḥ 03,132.001 lomaśa uvāca 03,132.001a yaḥ kathyate mantravid agryabuddhir; auddālakiḥ śvetaketuḥ pṛthivyām
GE07mbh_03_u:7572: 03,132.001c tasyāśramaṃ paśya narendra puṇyaṃ; sadāphalair upapannaṃ mahījaiḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:7573: 03,132.002a sākṣād atra śvetaketur dadarśa; sarasvatīṃ mānuṣadeharūpām 03,132.002c vetsyāmi vāṇīm iti saṃpravṛttāṃ; sarasvatīṃ śvetaketur babhāṣe
GE07mbh_03_u:7574: 03,132.003a tasmin kāle brahmavidāṃ variṣṭhāv; āstāṃ tadā mātulabhāgineyau
GE07mbh_03_u:7575: 03,132.003c aṣṭāvakraś caiva kahoḍasūnur; auddālakiḥ śvetaketuś ca rājan
GE07mbh_03_u:7576: 03,132.004a videharājasya mahīpates tau; viprāv ubhau mātulabhāgineyau
GE07mbh_03_u:7577: 03,132.004c praviśya yajñāyatanaṃ vivāde; bandiṃ nijagrāhatur aprameyam
GE07mbh_03_u:7583: 03,132.004d*0649_06 vāde bhaṅktvā majjayām āsa nadyām 03,132.005 yudhiṣṭhira uvāca 03,132.005a kathaṃprabhāvaḥ sa babhūva vipras; tathāyuktaṃ yo nijagrāha
GE07mbh_03_u:7587: 03,132.005c aṣṭāvakraḥ kena cāsau babhūva; tat sarvaṃ me lomaśa śaṃsa tattvam
GE07mbh_03_u:7588: 03,132.006 lomaśa uvāca 03,132.006a uddālakasya niyataḥ śiṣya eko; nāmnā kahoḍeti babhūva
GE07mbh_03_u:7589: 03,132.006c śuśrūṣur ācāryavaśānuvartī; dīrghaṃ kālaṃ so 'dhyayanaṃ cakāra
GE07mbh_03_u:7590: 03,132.007a taṃ vai viprāḥ paryabhavaṃś ca śiṣyās; taṃ ca jñātvā
GE07mbh_03_u:7592: 03,132.007b*0651_01 tasyaiva śiṣyasya parāṃ ca śiṣyatāṃ 03,132.007b*0651_02 jñātvā vikārāṃs tatsutāyās tadānīm
GE07mbh_03_u:7593: 03,132.007c tasmai prādāt sadya eva śrutaṃ ca; bhāryāṃ ca vai duhitaraṃ svāṃ sujātām
GE07mbh_03_u:7594: 03,132.008a tasyā garbhaḥ samabhavad agnikalpaḥ; so 'dhīyānaṃ pitaram athābhyuvāca 03,132.008c sarvāṃ rātrim adhyayanaṃ karoṣi; nedaṃ pitaḥ samyag
GE07mbh_03_u:7598: 03,132.008d*0652_03 ihaiva garbhe tena pitar bravīmi 03,132.008d*0652_04 nedaṃ tvattaḥ samyag ivopavartate
GE07mbh_03_u:7599: 03,132.009a upālabdhaḥ śiṣyamadhye maharṣiḥ; sa taṃ kopād udarasthaṃ śaśāpa 03,132.009c yasmāt kukṣau vartamāno bravīṣi; tasmād vakro bhavitāsy
GE07mbh_03_u:7601: 03,132.010a sa vai tathā vakra evābhyajāyad; aṣṭāvakraḥ prathito vai
GE07mbh_03_u:7603: 03,132.010c tasyāsīd vai mātulaḥ śvetaketuḥ; sa tena tulyo vayasā babhūva 03,132.011a saṃpīḍyamānā tu tadā sujātā; vivardhamānena sutena kukṣau
GE07mbh_03_u:7604: 03,132.011c uvāca bhartāram idaṃ rahogatā; prasādya hīnaṃ vasunā
GE07mbh_03_u:7606: 03,132.012a kathaṃ kariṣyāmy adhanā maharṣe; māsaś cāyaṃ daśamo vartate me 03,132.012c na cāsti te vasu kiṃ cit prajātā; yenāham etām āpadaṃ
GE07mbh_03_u:7608: 03,132.013a uktas tv evaṃ bhāryayā vai kahoḍo; vittasyārthe janakam athābhyagacchat
GE07mbh_03_u:7609: 03,132.013c sa vai tadā vādavidā nigṛhya; nimajjito bandinehāpsu vipraḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:7610: 03,132.014a uddālakas taṃ tu tadā niśamya; sūtena vāde 'psu tathā nimajjitam 03,132.014c uvāca tāṃ tatra tataḥ sujātām; aṣṭāvakre gūhitavyo 'yam arthaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:7611: 03,132.015a rarakṣa sā cāpy ati taṃ sumantraṃ; jāto 'py evaṃ na sa śuśrāva vipraḥ 03,132.015c uddālakaṃ pitṛvac cāpi mene; aṣṭāvakro bhrātṛvac chvetaketum
GE07mbh_03_u:7612: 03,132.016a tato varṣe dvādaśe śvetaketur; aṣṭāvakraṃ pitur aṅke nisannam
GE07mbh_03_u:7613: 03,132.016c apākarṣad gṛhya pāṇau rudantaṃ; nāyaṃ tavāṅkaḥ pitur ity uktavāṃś ca
GE07mbh_03_u:7614: 03,132.017a yat tenoktaṃ duruktaṃ tat tadānīṃ; hṛdi sthitaṃ tasya
GE07mbh_03_u:7615: suduḥkham āsīt 03,132.017c gṛhaṃ gatvā mātaraṃ rodamānaḥ; papracchedaṃ kva nu tāto mameti 03,132.018a tataḥ sujātā paramārtarūpā; śāpād bhītā sarvam evācacakṣe
GE07mbh_03_u:7616: 03,132.018c tad vai tattvaṃ sarvam ājñāya mātur; ity abravīc chvetaketuṃ
GE07mbh_03_u:7617: sa vipraḥ 03,132.019a gacchāva yajñaṃ janakasya rājño; bahvāścaryaḥ śrūyate tasya
GE07mbh_03_u:7619: 03,132.019c śroṣyāvo 'tra brāhmaṇānāṃ vivādam; annaṃ cāgryaṃ tatra
GE07mbh_03_u:7620: bhokṣyāvahe ca 03,132.019e vicakṣaṇatvaṃ ca bhaviṣyate nau; śivaś ca saumyaś ca hi brahmaghoṣaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:7621: 03,132.020a tau jagmatur mātulabhāgineyau; yajñaṃ samṛddhaṃ janakasya
GE07mbh_03_u:7623: 03,132.020c aṣṭāvakraḥ pathi rājñā sametya; utsāryamāṇo vākyam idaṃ jagāda
GE07mbh_03_u:7624: 03,133.001 aṣṭāvakra uvāca 03,133.001a andhasya panthā badhirasya panthāḥ; striyaḥ panthā vaivadhikasya panthāḥ 03,133.001c rājñaḥ panthā brāhmaṇenāsametya; sametya tu brāhmaṇasyaiva
GE07mbh_03_u:7627: 03,133.002a panthā ayaṃ te 'dya mayā nisṛṣṭo; yenecchase tena kāmaṃ
GE07mbh_03_u:7629: 03,133.002c na pāvako vidyate vai laghīyān; indro 'pi nityaṃ namate brāhmaṇānām
GE07mbh_03_u:7631: 03,133.002d*0653_01 sa evam ukto mātulenaiva sārdhaṃ 03,133.002d*0653_02 yatheṣṭamārgo yajñaniveśanaṃ tat
GE07mbh_03_u:7633: 03,133.002d*0653_04 dvāri dvāḥsthaṃ vākyam idaṃ babhāṣe 03,133.003 aṣṭāvakra uvāca 03,133.003a yajñaṃ draṣṭuṃ prāptavantau sva tāta; kautūhalaṃ nau balavad
GE07mbh_03_u:7634: vai vivṛddham 03,133.003c āvāṃ prāptāv atithī saṃpraveśaṃ; kāṅkṣāvahe dvārapate tavājñām
GE07mbh_03_u:7635: 03,133.004a aindradyumner yajñadṛśāv ihāvāṃ; vivakṣū vai janakendraṃ
GE07mbh_03_u:7637: 03,133.004c na vai krodhād vyādhinaivottamena; saṃyojaya dvārapāla kṣaṇena
GE07mbh_03_u:7638: 03,133.004d*0654_01 mā ca tvam āvāṃ vyādhinā tapyamānāv
GE07mbh_03_u:7639: 03,133.004d*0654_02 abhibhū tvaṃ bālakau bāliśau ca 03,133.004d*0654_03 samāyātau mātulabhāgineyau 03,133.004d*0654_04 saṃmoktavyau dvārapāla kṣaṇe 'smin
GE07mbh_03_u:7640: 03,133.005 dvārapāla uvāca 03,133.005a bandeḥ samādeśakarā vayaṃ sma; nibodha vākyaṃ ca
GE07mbh_03_u:7641: 03,133.005c na vai bālāḥ praviśanty atra viprā; vṛddhā vidvāṃsaḥ praviśanti dvijāgryāḥ 03,133.006 aṣṭāvakra uvāca 03,133.006a yady atra vṛddheṣu kṛtaḥ praveśo; yuktaṃ mama dvārapāla
GE07mbh_03_u:7643: 03,133.006c vayaṃ hi vṛddhāś caritavratāś ca; vedaprabhāvena praveśanārhāḥ 03,133.007a śuśrūṣavaś cāpi jitendriyāś ca; jñānāgame cāpi gatāḥ sma niṣṭhām 03,133.007c na bāla ity avamantavyam āhur; bālo 'py agnir dahati spṛśyamānaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:7644: 03,133.008 dvārapāla uvāca 03,133.008a sarasvatīm īraya vedajuṣṭām; ekākṣarāṃ bahurūpāṃ
GE07mbh_03_u:7645: 03,133.008c aṅgātmānaṃ samavekṣasva bālaṃ; kiṃ ślāghase durlabhā
GE07mbh_03_u:7647: 03,133.009 aṣṭāvakra uvāca 03,133.009a na jñāyate kāyavṛddhyā vivṛddhir; yathāṣṭhīlā śālmaleḥ saṃpravṛddhā
GE07mbh_03_u:7648: 03,133.009c hrasvo 'lpakāyaḥ phalito vivṛddho; yaś cāphalas tasya na vṛddhabhāvaḥ 03,133.010 dvārapāla uvāca 03,133.010a vṛddhebhya eveha matiṃ sma bālā; gṛhṇanti kālena bhavanti
GE07mbh_03_u:7650: 03,133.010c na hi jñānam alpakālena śakyaṃ; kasmād bālo vṛddha
GE07mbh_03_u:7652: 03,133.011 aṣṭāvakra uvāca 03,133.011a na tena sthaviro bhavati yenāsya palitaṃ śiraḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:7653: 03,133.011c bālo 'pi yaḥ prajānāti taṃ devāḥ sthaviraṃ viduḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:7654: 03,133.012a na hāyanair na palitair na vittena na bandhubhiḥ 03,133.012c ṛṣayaś cakrire dharmaṃ yo 'nūcānaḥ sa no mahān
GE07mbh_03_u:7655: 03,133.013a didṛkṣur asmi saṃprāpto bandinaṃ rājasaṃsadi 03,133.013c nivedayasva māṃ dvāḥstha rājñe puṣkaramāline 03,133.014a draṣṭāsy adya vadato dvārapāla; manīṣibhiḥ saha vāde vivṛddhe
GE07mbh_03_u:7656: 03,133.014b*0655_01 draṣṭāsy adya vadato 'smān dvārapāla manīṣibhiḥ 03,133.014b*0655_02 saha vāde vivṛddhe tu bandinaṃ cāpi nirjitam
GE07mbh_03_u:7659: 03,133.014c utāho vāpy uccatāṃ nīcatāṃ vā; tūṣṇīṃ bhūteṣv atha sarveṣu cādya 03,133.015 dvārapāla uvāca 03,133.015a kathaṃ yajñaṃ daśavarṣo viśes tvaṃ; vinītānāṃ viduṣāṃ saṃpraveśyam
GE07mbh_03_u:7661: 03,133.015c upāyataḥ prayatiṣye tavāhaṃ; praveśane kuru yatnaṃ yathāvat
GE07mbh_03_u:7662: 03,133.015d*0658_01 eṣa rājā saṃśravaṇe sthitas te 03,133.015d*0658_02 stuhy enaṃ tvaṃ vacasā saṃskṛtena 03,133.015d*0658_03 sa cānujñāṃ dāsyati prītiyuktaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:7663: 03,133.015d*0658_04 praveśane yac ca kiṃ cit taveṣṭam
GE07mbh_03_u:7664: 03,133.016 aṣṭāvakra uvāca 03,133.016a bho bho rājañ janakānāṃ variṣṭha; sabhājyas tvaṃ tvayi sarvaṃ samṛddham 03,133.016c tvaṃ vā kartā karmaṇāṃ yajñiyānāṃ; yayātir eko nṛpatir vā purastāt 03,133.017a vidvān bandī vedavido nigṛhya; vāde bhagnān apratiśaṅkamānaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:7665: 03,133.017c tvayā nisṛṣṭaiḥ puruṣair āptakṛdbhir; jale sarvān majjayatīti
GE07mbh_03_u:7666: naḥ śrutam 03,133.018a sa tac chrutvā brāhmaṇānāṃ sakāśād; brahmodyaṃ vai kathayitum

GE07mbh_03_u:13720: 03,222.010c tathā hy upetā buddhyā tvaṃ kṛṣṇasya mahiṣī priyā 03,222.011a yadaiva bhartā jānīyān mantramūlaparāṃ striyam 03,222.011c udvijeta tadaivāsyāḥ sarpād veśmagatād iva 03,222.012a udvignasya kutaḥ śāntir aśāntasya kutaḥ sukham
GE07mbh_03_u:13721: 03,222.012c na jātu vaśago bhartā striyāḥ syān mantrakāraṇāt
GE07mbh_03_u:13723: 03,222.013c mūlapravādair hi viṣaṃ prayacchanti jighāṃsavaḥ 03,222.014a jihvayā yāni puruṣas tvacā vāpy upasevate
GE07mbh_03_u:13724: 03,222.014c tatra cūrṇāni dattāni hanyuḥ kṣipram asaṃśayam
GE07mbh_03_u:13726: 03,222.015c apumāṃsaḥ kṛtāḥ strībhir jaḍāndhabadhirās tathā 03,222.016a pāpānugās tu pāpās tāḥ patīn upasṛjanty uta
GE07mbh_03_u:13727: 03,222.016c na jātu vipriyaṃ bhartuḥ striyā kāryaṃ kathaṃ cana 03,222.017a vartāmy ahaṃ tu yāṃ vṛttiṃ pāṇḍaveṣu mahātmasu
GE07mbh_03_u:13728: 03,222.017c tāṃ sarvāṃ śṛṇu me satyāṃ satyabhāme yaśasvini
GE07mbh_03_u:13729: 03,222.018a ahaṃkāraṃ vihāyāhaṃ kāmakrodhau ca sarvadā 03,222.018c sadārān pāṇḍavān nityaṃ prayatopacarāmy aham 03,222.019a praṇayaṃ pratisaṃgṛhya nidhāyātmānam ātmani
GE07mbh_03_u:13735: 03,222.022a devo manuṣyo gandharvo yuvā cāpi svalaṃkṛtaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:13736: 03,222.022c dravyavān abhirūpo vā na me 'nyaḥ puruṣo mataḥ 03,222.023a nābhuktavati nāsnāte nāsaṃviṣṭe ca bhartari 03,222.023c na saṃviśāmi nāśnāmi sadā karmakareṣv api
GE07mbh_03_u:13737: 03,222.024a kṣetrād vanād vā grāmād vā bhartāraṃ gṛham āgatam 03,222.024c pratyutthāyābhinandāmi āsanenodakena ca
GE07mbh_03_u:13741: 03,222.026c anukūlavatī nityaṃ bhavāmy analasā sadā 03,222.027a anarme cāpi hasanaṃ dvāri sthānam abhīkṣṇaśaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:13742: 03,222.027c avaskare cirasthānaṃ niṣkuṭeṣu ca varjaye 03,222.027d*1094_01 niratāhaṃ sadā satye pāpānāṃ ca visarjane
GE07mbh_03_u:13744: 03,222.028a atihāsātiroṣau ca krodhasthānaṃ ca varjaye 03,222.028c niratāhaṃ sadā satye bhartṝṇām upasevane 03,222.028e sarvathā bhartṛrahitaṃ na mameṣṭaṃ kathaṃ cana
GE07mbh_03_u:13745: 03,222.029a yadā pravasate bhartā kuṭumbārthena kena cit
GE07mbh_03_u:13747: 03,222.030a yac ca bhartā na pibati yac ca bhartā na khādati
GE07mbh_03_u:13748: 03,222.030c yac ca nāśnāti me bhartā sarvaṃ tad varjayāmy aham
GE07mbh_03_u:13750: 03,222.031c svalaṃkṛtā suprayatā bhartuḥ priyahite ratā 03,222.032a ye ca dharmāḥ kuṭumbeṣu śvaśrvā me kathitāḥ purā 03,222.032b*1096_01 anutiṣṭhāmi taṃ satye nityakālam atandritā 03,222.032c bhikṣābaliśrāddham iti sthālīpākāś ca parvasu 03,222.032e mānyānāṃ mānasatkārā ye cānye viditā mayā
GE07mbh_03_u:13751: 03,222.033a tān sarvān anuvartāmi divārātram atandritā 03,222.033c vinayān niyamāṃś cāpi sadā sarvātmanā śritā
GE07mbh_03_u:13753: 03,222.034c āśīviṣān iva kruddhān patīn paricarāmy aham
GE07mbh_03_u:13754: 03,222.035a patyāśrayo hi me dharmo mataḥ strīṇāṃ sanātanaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:13755: 03,222.035c sa devaḥ sā gatir nānyā tasya kā vipriyaṃ caret
GE07mbh_03_u:13756: 03,222.036a ahaṃ patīn nātiśaye nātyaśne nātibhūṣaye 03,222.036c nāpi parivade śvaśrūṃ sarvadā pariyantritā 03,222.037a avadhānena subhage nityotthānatayaiva ca
GE07mbh_03_u:13757: 03,222.037c bhartāro vaśagā mahyaṃ guruśuśrūṣaṇena ca 03,222.038a nityam āryām ahaṃ kuntīṃ vīrasūṃ satyavādinīm
GE07mbh_03_u:13760: 03,222.039c nāpi parivade cāhaṃ tāṃ pṛthāṃ pṛthivīsamām
GE07mbh_03_u:13761: 03,222.040a aṣṭāv agre brāhmaṇānāṃ sahasrāṇi sma nityadā
GE07mbh_03_u:13764: 03,222.041c triṃśaddāsīka ekaiko yān bibharti yudhiṣṭhiraḥ 03,222.042a daśānyāni sahasrāṇi yeṣām annaṃ susaṃskṛtam 03,222.042c hriyate rukmapātrībhir yatīnām ūrdhvaretasām
GE07mbh_03_u:13765: 03,222.043a tān sarvān agrahāreṇa brāhmaṇān brahmavādinaḥ 03,222.043c yathārhaṃ pūjayāmi sma pānācchādanabhojanaiḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:13769: 03,222.045c maṇīn hema ca bibhratyo nṛtyagītaviśāradāḥ 03,222.046a tāsāṃ nāma ca rūpaṃ ca bhojanācchādanāni ca
GE07mbh_03_u:13770: 03,222.046c sarvāsām eva vedāhaṃ karma caiva kṛtākṛtam
GE07mbh_03_u:13772: 03,222.047c pātrīhastā divārātram atithīn bhojayanty uta 03,222.048a śatam aśvasahasrāṇi daśa nāgāyutāni ca 03,222.048c yudhiṣṭhirasyānuyātram indraprasthanivāsinaḥ 03,222.049a etad āsīt tadā rājño yan mahīṃ paryapālayat
GE07mbh_03_u:13773: 03,222.049c yeṣāṃ saṃkhyāvidhiṃ caiva pradiśāmi śṛṇomi ca
GE07mbh_03_u:13774: 03,222.050a antaḥpurāṇāṃ sarveṣāṃ bhṛtyānāṃ caiva sarvaśaḥ 03,222.050c ā gopālāvipālebhyaḥ sarvaṃ veda kṛtākṛtam 03,222.051a sarvaṃ rājñaḥ samudayam āyaṃ ca vyayam eva ca 03,222.051c ekāhaṃ vedmi kalyāṇi pāṇḍavānāṃ yaśasvinām 03,222.052a mayi sarvaṃ samāsajya kuṭumbaṃ bharatarṣabhāḥ 03,222.052c upāsanaratāḥ sarve ghaṭante sma śubhānane 03,222.053a tam ahaṃ bhāram āsaktam anādhṛṣyaṃ durātmabhiḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:13775: 03,222.053c sukhaṃ sarvaṃ parityajya rātryahāni ghaṭāmi vai
GE07mbh_03_u:13777: 03,222.054c ekāhaṃ vedmi kośaṃ vai patīnāṃ dharmacāriṇām
GE07mbh_03_u:13778: 03,222.055a aniśāyāṃ niśāyāṃ ca sahāyāḥ kṣutpipāsayoḥ 03,222.055c ārādhayantyāḥ kauravyāṃs tulyā rātrir ahaś ca me
GE07mbh_03_u:13779: 03,222.056a prathamaṃ pratibudhyāmi caramaṃ saṃviśāmi ca 03,222.056c nityakālam ahaṃ satye etat saṃvananaṃ mama
GE07mbh_03_u:13780: 03,222.057a etaj jānāmy ahaṃ kartuṃ bhartṛsaṃvananaṃ mahat
GE07mbh_03_u:13781: 03,222.057c asatstrīṇāṃ samācāraṃ nāhaṃ kuryāṃ na kāmaye
GE07mbh_03_u:13782: 03,222.058a tac chrutvā dharmasahitaṃ vyāhṛtaṃ kṛṣṇayā tadā
GE07mbh_03_u:13783: 03,222.058c uvāca satyā satkṛtya pāñcālīṃ dharmacāriṇīm 03,222.059a abhipannāsmi pāñcāli yājñaseni kṣamasva me 03,222.059c kāmakāraḥ sakhīnāṃ hi sopahāsaṃ prabhāṣitum 03,223.001 draupady uvāca 03,223.001a imaṃ tu te mārgam apetadoṣaṃ; vakṣyāmi cittagrahaṇāya bhartuḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:13784: 03,223.001c yasmin yathāvat sakhi vartamānā; bhartāram ācchetsyasi kāminībhyaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:13785: 03,223.002a naitādṛśaṃ daivatam asti satye; sarveṣu lokeṣu sadaivateṣu
GE07mbh_03_u:13786: 03,223.002c yathā patis tasya hi sarvakāmā; labhyāḥ prasāde kupitaś ca hanyāt 03,223.003a tasmād apatyaṃ vividhāś ca bhogāḥ; śayyāsanāny adbhutadarśanāni 03,223.003c vastrāṇi mālyāni tathaiva gandhāḥ; svargaś ca loko viṣamā ca kīrtiḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:13787: 03,223.004a sukhaṃ sukheneha na jātu labhyaṃ; duḥkhena sādhvī labhate
GE07mbh_03_u:13789: 03,223.004c sā kṛṣṇam ārādhaya sauhṛdena; premṇā ca nityaṃ pratikarmaṇā ca 03,223.005a tathāśanaiś cārubhir agryamālyair; dākṣiṇyayogair vividhaiś ca
GE07mbh_03_u:13791: 03,223.005c asyāḥ priyo 'smīti yathā viditvā; tvām eva saṃśliṣyati
GE07mbh_03_u:13793: 03,223.006a śrutvā svaraṃ dvāragatasya bhartuḥ; pratyutthitā tiṣṭha gṛhasya madhye 03,223.006c dṛṣṭvā praviṣṭaṃ tvaritāsanena; pādyena caiva pratipūjaya tvam
GE07mbh_03_u:13794: 03,223.007a saṃpreṣitāyām atha caiva dāsyām; utthāya sarvaṃ svayam eva kuryāḥ 03,223.007c jānātu kṛṣṇas tava bhāvam etaṃ; sarvātmanā māṃ bhajatīti satye
GE07mbh_03_u:13795: 03,223.008a tvatsaṃnidhau yat kathayet patis te; yady apy aguhyaṃ
GE07mbh_03_u:13797: 03,223.008c kā cit sapatnī tava vāsudevaṃ; pratyādiśet tena bhaved virāgaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:13798: 03,223.009a priyāṃś ca raktāṃś ca hitāṃś ca bhartus; tān bhojayethā vividhair upāyaiḥ 03,223.009c dveṣyair apakṣair ahitaiś ca tasya; bhidyasva nityaṃ kuhakoddhataiś ca 03,223.010a madaṃ pramādaṃ puruṣeṣu hitvā; saṃyaccha bhāvaṃ pratigṛhya
GE07mbh_03_u:13800: 03,223.010c pradyumnasāmbāv api te kumārau; nopāsitavyau rahite kadā cit
GE07mbh_03_u:13801: 03,223.011a mahākulīnābhir apāpikābhiḥ; strībhiḥ satībhis tava sakhyam astu 03,223.011c caṇḍāś ca śauṇḍāś ca mahāśanāś ca; caurāś ca duṣṭāś capalāś ca varjyāḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:13802: 03,223.012a etad yaśasyaṃ bhagavedanaṃ ca; svargyaṃ tathā śatrunibarhaṇaṃ
GE07mbh_03_u:13805: 03,224.001 vaiśaṃpāyana uvāca 03,224.001a mārkaṇḍeyādibhir vipraiḥ pāṇḍavaiś ca mahātmabhiḥ 03,224.001c kathābhir anukūlābhiḥ sahāsitvā janārdanaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:13806: 03,224.002a tatas taiḥ saṃvidaṃ kṛtvā yathāvan madhusūdanaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:13807: 03,224.002c ārurukṣū rathaṃ satyām āhvayām āsa keśavaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:13808: 03,224.003a satyabhāmā tatas tatra svajitvā drupadātmajām 03,224.003c uvāca vacanaṃ hṛdyaṃ
GE07mbh_03_u:13809: 03,224.004a kṛṣṇe mā bhūt tavotkaṇṭhā mā vyathā mā prajāgaraḥ 03,224.004c bhartṛbhir devasaṃkāśair jitāṃ prāpsyasi medinīm 03,224.005a na hy evaṃ śīlasaṃpannā naivaṃ pūjitalakṣaṇāḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:13810: 03,224.005c prāpnuvanti ciraṃ kleśaṃ yathā tvam asitekṣaṇe
GE07mbh_03_u:13811: 03,224.006a avaśyaṃ ca tvayā bhūmir iyaṃ nihatakaṇṭakā
GE07mbh_03_u:13812: 03,224.006c bhartṛbhiḥ saha bhoktavyā nirdvaṃdveti śrutaṃ mayā
GE07mbh_03_u:13813: 03,224.007a dhārtarāṣṭravadhaṃ kṛtvā vairāṇi pratiyātya ca 03,224.007c yudhiṣṭhirasthāṃ pṛthivīṃ draṣṭāsi drupadātmaje
GE07mbh_03_u:13814: 03,224.008a yās tāḥ pravrājamānāṃ tvāṃ prāhasan darpamohitāḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:13815: 03,224.008c tāḥ kṣipraṃ hatasaṃkalpā drakṣyasi tvaṃ kurustriyaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:13816: 03,224.009a tava duḥkhopapannāyā yair ācaritam apriyam 03,224.009c viddhi saṃprasthitān sarvāṃs tān kṛṣṇe yamasādanam
GE07mbh_03_u:13817: 03,224.009d*1097_01 ye ca tatra sthitā rājñi tatpakṣīyāḥ kṣitīśvarāḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:13818: 03,224.009d*1097_02 teṣāṃ kālaḥ kṣitīśānāṃ prāptaḥ kṛṣṇe durāsadaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:13819: 03,224.010a putras te prativindhyaś ca sutasomas tathā vibhuḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:13820: 03,224.010c śrutakarmārjuniś caiva śatānīkaś ca nākuliḥ 03,224.010e sahadevāc ca yo jātaḥ śrutasenas tavātmajaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:13821: 03,224.011a sarve kuśalino vīrāḥ kṛtāstrāś ca sutās tava
GE07mbh_03_u:13822: 03,224.011c abhimanyur iva prītā dvāravatyāṃ ratā bhṛśam
GE07mbh_03_u:13823: 03,224.012a tvam ivaiṣāṃ subhadrā ca prītyā sarvātmanā sthitā
GE07mbh_03_u:13824: 03,224.012c prīyate bhāvanirdvaṃdvā tebhyaś ca vigatajvarā 03,224.012d*1098_01 duḥkhitā tena duḥkhena sukhena sukhitā tathā
GE07mbh_03_u:13825: 03,224.013a bheje sarvātmanā caiva pradyumnajananī tathā 03,224.013c bhānuprabhṛtibhiś cainān viśinaṣṭi ca keśavaḥ 03,224.014a bhojanācchādane caiṣāṃ nityaṃ me śvaśuraḥ sthitaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:13827: 03,224.014e tulyo hi praṇayas teṣāṃ pradyumnasya ca bhāmini
GE07mbh_03_u:13828: 03,224.015a evamādi priyaṃ prītyā hṛdyam uktvā manonugam
GE07mbh_03_u:13829: 03,224.015c gamanāya manaś cakre vāsudevarathaṃ prati 03,224.016a tāṃ kṛṣṇāṃ kṛṣṇamahiṣī
GE07mbh_03_u:13830: 03,224.016c āruroha rathaṃ śaureḥ satyabhāmā ca bhāminī
GE07mbh_03_u:13831: 03,224.017a smayitvā tu yaduśreṣṭho draupadīṃ parisāntvya ca
GE07mbh_03_u:13832: 03,224.017c upāvartya tataḥ śīghrair hayaiḥ prāyāt paraṃtapaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:13833: 03,225.001 janamejaya uvāca 03,225.001a evaṃ vane vartamānā narāgryāḥ; śītoṣṇavātātapakarśitāṅgāḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:13834: 03,225.001c saras tad āsādya vanaṃ ca puṇyaṃ; tataḥ paraṃ kim akurvanta pārthāḥ 03,225.002 vaiśaṃpāyana uvāca 03,225.002a saras tad āsādya tu pāṇḍuputrā; janaṃ samutsṛjya vidhāya
GE07mbh_03_u:13836: 03,225.002c vanāni ramyāṇy atha parvatāṃś ca; nadīpradeśāṃś ca tadā
GE07mbh_03_u:13838: 03,225.003a tathā vane tān vasataḥ pravīrān; svādhyāyavantaś ca tapodhanāś
GE07mbh_03_u:13840: 03,225.003c abhyāyayur vedavidaḥ purāṇās; tān pūjayām āsur atho narāgryāḥ 03,225.004a tataḥ kadā cit kuśalaḥ kathāsu; vipro 'bhyagacchad bhuvi kauraveyān 03,225.004c sa taiḥ sametyātha yadṛcchayaiva; vaicitravīryaṃ nṛpam abhyagacchat
GE07mbh_03_u:13841: 03,225.005a athopaviṣṭaḥ pratisatkṛtaś ca; vṛddhena rājñā kurusattamena
GE07mbh_03_u:13842: 03,225.005c pracoditaḥ san kathayāṃ babhūva; dharmānilendraprabhavān yamau ca
GE07mbh_03_u:13843: 03,225.006a kṛśāṃś ca vātātapakarśitāṅgān; duḥkhasya cograsya mukhe
GE07mbh_03_u:13845: 03,225.006c tāṃ cāpy anāthām iva vīranāthāṃ; kṛṣṇāṃ parikleśaguṇena yuktām
GE07mbh_03_u:13846: 03,225.007a tataḥ kathāṃ tasya niśamya rājā; vaicitravīryaḥ kṛpayābhitaptaḥ 03,225.007c vane sthitān pārthivaputrapautrāñ; śrutvā tadā duḥkhanadīṃ
GE07mbh_03_u:13849: 03,225.008c vācaṃ kathaṃ cit sthiratām upetya; tat sarvam ātmaprabhavaṃ
GE07mbh_03_u:13851: 03,225.009a kathaṃ nu satyaḥ śucir āryavṛtto; jyeṣṭhaḥ sutānāṃ mama
GE07mbh_03_u:13856: 03,225.010c patatrisaṃghaiḥ sa jaghanyarātre; prabodhyate nūnam iḍātalasthaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:13857: 03,225.011a kathaṃ nu vātātapakarśitāṅgo; vṛkodaraḥ kopapariplutāṅgaḥ 03,225.011c śete pṛthivyām atathocitāṅgaḥ; kṛṣṇāsamakṣaṃ vasudhātalasthaḥ 03,225.012a tathārjunaḥ sukumāro manasvī; vaśe sthito dharmasutasya rājñaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:13858: 03,225.012c vidūyamānair iva sarvagātrair; dhruvaṃ na śete vasatīr amarṣāt 03,225.013a yamau ca kṛṣṇāṃ ca yudhiṣṭhiraṃ ca; bhīmaṃ ca dṛṣṭvā
GE07mbh_03_u:13860: 03,225.013c viniḥśvasan sarpa ivogratejā; dhruvaṃ na śete vasatīr amarṣāt 03,225.014a tathā yamau cāpy asukhau sukhārhau; samṛddharūpāv amarau divīva
GE07mbh_03_u:13861: 03,225.014c prajāgarasthau dhruvam apraśāntau; dharmeṇa satyena ca
GE07mbh_03_u:13863: 03,225.015a samīraṇenāpi samo balena; samīraṇasyaiva suto balīyān
GE07mbh_03_u:13864: 03,225.015c sa dharmapāśena sitogratejā; dhruvaṃ viniḥśvasya sahaty
GE07mbh_03_u:13866: 03,225.016a sa cāpi bhūmau parivartamāno; vadhaṃ sutānāṃ mama kāṅkṣamāṇaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:13867: 03,225.016c satyena dharmeṇa ca vāryamāṇaḥ; kālaṃ pratīkṣaty adhiko raṇe
GE07mbh_03_u:13869: 03,225.017a ajātaśatrau tu jite nikṛtyā; duḥśāsano yat paruṣāṇy avocat
GE07mbh_03_u:13870: 03,225.017c tāni praviṣṭāni vṛkodarāṅgaṃ; dahanti marmāgnir ivendhanāni
GE07mbh_03_u:13871: 03,225.018a na pāpakaṃ dhyāsyati dharmaputro; dhanaṃjayaś cāpy anuvartate
GE07mbh_03_u:13873: 03,225.018c araṇyavāsena vivardhate tu; bhīmasya kopo 'gnir ivānilena

GE07mbh_03_u:15162: 03,252.001 vaiśaṃpāyana uvāca 03,252.001a saroṣarāgopahatena valgunā; sarāganetreṇa natonnatabhruvā 03,252.001c mukhena visphūrya suvīrarāṣṭrapaṃ; tato 'bravīt taṃ drupadātmajā punaḥ

GE07mbh_03_u:15187: 03,252.014a yasyā hi kṛṣṇau padavīṃ caretāṃ; samāsthitāv ekarathe sahāyau

GE07mbh_03_u:15220: 03,253.001 vaiśaṃpāyana uvāca 03,253.001a tato diśaḥ saṃpravihṛtya pārthā; mṛgān varāhān mahiṣāṃś ca hatvā 03,253.001c dhanurdharāḥ śreṣṭhatamāḥ pṛthivyāṃ; pṛthak carantaḥ sahitā

GE07mbh_03_u:15269: 03,253.019e mahaty araṇye mṛgayāṃ caritvā; purā śṛgālo nalinīṃ vigāhate
